notes.text: sap.f.CalendarInCard: Now allows 12 hour format of appointment time
sap.m.TabContainer: sync customData between outer and internal controls
We've now removed sap.m.upload.UploadSetwithTable deprecated control along with its files and folders from the repository, since it was introduced as an experimental control
sap.m.TabContainer: doesn't show scroll bar if not needed
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: translations are now correclty applied
sap.m.Slider, sap.m.RangeSlider: Documentation update
sap.m.Input: Exact match with no autocomplete behavior corrected
We now ensure that the correct list item is selected when the setSelectedItemById API is used
We now ensure that the Upload button has a left margin same as other buttons in the table action row
We've now updated the filetypeMismatch event to send the correct filetype or mimetype
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Add new options
sap.m.ObjectStatus: update documentation regarding wrapping behavior of the control
sap.m.MessageView: invalidate details page before navigation
sap.m.Carousel: On touch devices navigation arrows are always visible
sap.m.RatingIndicator: Display only compact indicator fixed
: sap.m.Label: when the label is with percent width it works
We now ensure that the UploadEnabled property setting enables or disables drag and drop that is attached from the plugin
CellSelector: Provide selection change event
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: add week announcement to grid cells
sap.m.ObjectStatus: new CSS class for languages with higher line heights
sap.m.Dialog: Prevent null within area resize observer deregistration
We've now fixed the issue of truncating characters in the GenericTile header section by removing the usage of sap.m.Text deprecated method
sap.m.Label: Ensure colon and asterisk are always displayed by using flex box
Demo Kit: Icon explorer scroll fixed
